testcase.name: Check Opt Out Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed Then the user sees the "Opt Out" text in the Menu...........................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Opt Out
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user fills the "email login" field with "nicole.azevedo@mail.pt"....passed And the user fills the "password login" field with "12345678"...............passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Opt Out" text in the Menu.......................passed And the user sees the Confirmation Dialog "Opt Out Confirmation"............passed And the user clicks on the "Yes" button.....................................passed Then the user sees the "LOGIN" screen.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Register with Existing Email After Opt Out
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user fills the "email login" field with "nicole.azevedo@mail.pt"....passed And the user fills the "password login" field with "12345678"...............passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Opt Out" text in the Menu.......................passed And the user sees the Confirmation Dialog "Opt Out Confirmation"............passed And the user clicks on the "Yes" button.....................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the user clicks on the "REGISTER" button................................passed And the user fills the "email register2" field with "nicole.azevedo@mail.pt".passed And the user clicks on the "REGISTER register2" button......................passed Then the user sees the Confirmation Dialog "Contact Administrator"..........passed
